welcome_message_body: Welcome to Derby, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Stephanie's
restaurants.description: Stephanie's is a american restaurant located in Commerce City.

restaurants.name: El Jardin

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beech Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, shopping, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Beech Airport caters to private jet owners and offers exclusive services such as VIP lounges and concierge assistance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mid-Continent Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Dorado Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Dorado Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arkansas City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arkansas City Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
